title: Tim Tebow On The NBA & China – It Is Important To Stand Up For Your Beliefs & Convictions
text:
Former NFL player Tim Tebow sat with Brian Kilmeade to discuss the controversial relationship between the NBA and China, returning to play for the New York Mets in the minor leagues next season and ruling out a return to professional football.

Plus, Tebow discusses how the KETO diet has helps give him sustained energy while losing weight and mental clarity throughout the day.
